videoJson.name: Cartrivision
videoJson.fact1: This format was on the market for only one year, from June 1972 to July 1973, before manufacturing ceased due to low sales
videoJson.fact2: The first model of a Cartrivision -equipped TV set sold for (US) $1,350
videoJson.fact3: Red cassettes, meant for video rentals, could not be rewound by a home machine
